title: Amber Rose shares snaps of her parents holding her son Slash...10 days after she welcomes him
text:
She gave birth to her second child, a baby boy named Slash, on Oct. 10.

And Amber Rose posted a couple of photos of his first time alongside her parents Michael and Dorothy on Sunday.

The 36-year-old model and media personality captioned the sweet set of photos: 'My Mommy & Daddy holding Slash.'

Precious: Amber Rose posted a couple of photos of Slash's first time alongside her parents Michael and Dorothy on Sunday

Dorothy sat in a hospital chair holding the baby to her chest as he caressed his tiny head.

Michael cradled little Slash in both arms as he gazed directly into the camera.

Amber shares Slash with boyfriend Alexander ‘AE’ Edwards, 32.

Sweet: The 36-year-old model and media personality captioned the sweet set of photos: 'My Mommy & Daddy holding Slash'

AE announced Slash's arrival with a sweet Instagram post after he was born.

'The world is urs now,' he wrote in the caption. 'thank u, Amber Rose, for loving me so much that u put ur body thru it 2 bring my sun [sic] in2 the world. I could never be as strong as u. Slash a rockstar.'

Amber is already mom to six-year-old Sebastian Taylor Thomaz, whom she shares with rapper Wiz Khalifa.

Adorable: AE announced Slash's arrival with a sweet Instagram post after he was born

She announced her pregnancy back in April with an Instagram post of her growing baby bump on full display.

'[Alexander] and I are SUPER excited to announce that we have a sweet little baby boy on the way!' she wrote in the caption.

'P.S Sebastian is soooooo happy to be a big brother!' she added.

Coupled: Amber and AE met in 2015, but didn't start dating until 2018

In May, Amber divulged that she suffers from hyperemesis gravidarum, 'a condition characterized by severe nausea, vomiting, weight loss, and electrolyte disturbance,' according to the American Pregnancy Association.

'I want to be cute. I want to show off my belly, but I just can’t get off this couch!' Amber said in an Instagram video in May.

'I’m tired, and I just want to barf all day, it’s just not fun. But it’s totally worth it.'

Amber and AE met in 2015, but didn't start dating until 2018.
description: She gave birth to her second child, a baby boy named Slash, on Oct. 10.  And Amber Rose posted a couple of photos of his first time alongside her parents Michael and Dorothy on Sunday.
